title: Energizer LED 2D 2 Pin GR8 Bulb, 7W = 16W, 750 Lumens, 4000K Cool White, 30 Year Lifespan
features: WATTAGE EFFICIENCY: 7W 2D LED lamp provides equivalent light output to a 16W traditional bulb, offering significant energy savings
LIGHT OUTPUT: Produces 750 lumens of cool white light at 4000K colour temperature, perfect for task lighting
LONG LIFESPAN: Rated for 30,000 hours of operation, equivalent to approximately 30 years of typical household use
COMPATIBILITY: Features a 2-pin GR8 base design for direct replacement in compatible light fixtures
DESIGN: Butterfly-style 2D lamp configuration ensures wide light distribution and uniform illumination
description: Illuminate your space efficiently with this LED 2D lamp featuring a GR8 2-pin base. Operating at 7W whilst delivering light output equivalent to a 16W traditional bulb, this lamp produces a bright 750 lumens of cool white light at 4000K colour temperature. Perfect for commercial and residential applications, it offers remarkable longevity with up to 30,000 hours of operation. The lamp provides consistent, flicker-free illumination ideal for offices, retail spaces, and home environments. Its 2-pin GR8 fitting ensures compatibility with existing fixtures, making it a straightforward replacement option. The cool white output creates an invigorating atmosphere suitable for task-oriented spaces. With its energy-efficient performance and extended lifespan, this LED lamp offers a practical lighting solution that combines reliability with superior light quality.

specifications_table.Special features: ‎Energy Efficient, Instant On, 4000k Cool White, 750 Lumens Output, Long Lifespan
